TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_lihuy, title = lihuy, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/lihuy} }

S.FORM: lihuy Mlikuy 'tayal sraral ga, tlhuyan qu lihuy nha. ima qu ini tlhuzi ga, mutux nha psyaqan.
lihoy Mlikoy 'tayal sraral ga, tlhoyan qo lihoy nha. ima qo ini tlhozi ga, motox nha psyaqan.
